questions.quote: Yeah, this is Kramer. I got Genderson in the car. He wants to see his fish. I'm taking him to see his fish. So tell the police to back off.
So, your car caught fire because of my father and the woman on the horse?
Yes, it bothered me. So I bought a pair of shoes at Botticelli's, I'm not allowed to shop there? That really embarrassed me.
Hey Todd. Let me ask you a question. Um. Was this whole date thing just a way of asking me out?
Oh...yeah...uh you've never met my wife, Meryl? Meryl Seinfeld.
Boy, look at that. Se that's that fire I was listening to yesterday.
Well, I'm not buying it. No way. Forget it. No way I'm buying this!  I mean, look at it! What is it? It's a bunch of squiggly lines!  Are you telling me you couldn't paint this?
Will you calm down. I took all my blood down to Newman's. He let me put it in his meat freezer.
George, I don't get it. If there's no Human Fund, those donation cards were fake. You better have a damn good reason why you gave me a fake Christmas gift.
Well, I guess he figured you just wouldn't care. It *has* been a few years.
